name: 1rfp-project
description: 1RFP - Centralized grant discovery tool for Bay Area nonprofits

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd 1rfp-app && npm install && cd ../importer && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && cd 1rfp-app && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && cd ../importer && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json
